alert.note: Alert for Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:18AM EST until January 13 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. The snow will likely be heavy and wet. * WHERE...Portions of south central and western Maine and central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...A fast moving system will bring a period of light to moderate snowfall to the region. Travel will be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on untreated roads. Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
